entry.title: Andy Capp's Beer Battered Onion Rings - 2oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: ConAgra Foods Inc.
Type: Snacks
Price: 2.99

Taste the Oven Baked Crunch!

     If you're looking for a yummy corn and oat snack with a satisfying crunch and bold flavour, look no further! Andy Capp's has a delicious line of snacks with 0g of trans fat that are oven-baked not fried, giving you munchies you can feel good about.

     These Beer Battered Onion Rings are a thick and tasty snack without any of the overpowering flavour of an onion seasoning. A great taste that gets even greater when you share with friends and family!

2oz / 56.7g | 1 bag

3oz / 85g | 1 bag

entry.title: Popeye Candy Sticks - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 4.99

Nostalgic 50s Sweets to Share!

     Popeye Candy Sticks are the perfect treat to share with all the kids on Halloween, they bring back so many fond trick-or-treating memories! This 24 count bulk bag makes it easy to fill a bowl full of the retro classic candy to pass around or leave out for a fun party. 

60g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: Brach's Candy Corn - 11oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 4.99

The Classic Festive Candy!

     A timeless treat, these pieces of Brach's Classic Candy Corn are as yummy as the real honey that's used to make them! Get ready for Halloween by stocking up on this nostalgic candy that makes every autumn a little bit sweeter.

11oz / 312g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: Millions Vimto Remix - 35g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Millions
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

A Delicious Collab Between Millions and Vimto

     These little drops are intensely juicy and full of flavour, Millions and Vimto did quite the bang-up job! Get the real fruit juice flavour of Mango, Strawberry, and Pineapple in every bite. 

     Make sure to share the Remix experience! Any fan of tropical fruity flavours needs to try these delicious sweets.

  • Natural Colour
  • Contains Real Fruit Juice

 

35g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Trolli Twisted Sour Brite Crawlers - 4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Innovative Deliciousness!

     Trolli, the almighty inventor of the gummy worm, has blessed us with yet another delicious gummy concoction! New Twisted Sour Brite Crawlers are bite-sized twists with a tasty, chewy outside and a yummy berry filling. Each bag has an assortment of Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, and Green Apple flavours. 

     These are sure to hit that sweet spot, whether you just wanna munch on them while watching Netflix or share them with friends!

See the rest of our delicious Trolli gummies, there's a flavour for everyone!

4oz | 1 peg bag

entry.title: Red Vines Candy Corn Licorice - 4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

A Delicious Festive Sweet

     A fun treat any licorice fan would go crazy over! These delightful Red Vines Twists are flavoured to taste just like Candy Corn - an amazing fall-inspired flavour that's warm and nostalgic. Even the packaging is ready for the season!

  • No Preservatives
  • Fat-Free

4oz | 1 sleeve

entry.title: Rocky Road Sea Salt - 1.8oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Annabelle Candy Co. Inc.
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

The Original Marshmallow in Chocolate - Now Salted!

     One bite into this fluffy and crunchy delight, and you won't want another marshmallow treat! Annabelle's Rocky Road Sea Salt has a soft marshmallow center, enveloped by rich dark chocolate, and topped with bits of cashews and flakes of sea salt. Indulge yourself with a little treat; although they're so delicious, it's hard to stop at just one!

 

1.8oz | 1 bar

entry.title: Rocky Road S'mores - 1.8oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Annabelle Candy Co. Inc.
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

The Original Marshmallow in Chocolate - S'mores Edition!

     One bite into this fluffy and crunchy delight, and you won't want another marshmallow treat! Annabelle's Rocky Road S'mores has a soft marshmallow center stuffed with Real Graham Cracker, then enveloped by smooth, rich milk chocolate with bits of cashews sprinkled within. Indulge yourself with a little treat; although they're so delicious, it's hard to stop at just one!

 

1.8oz | 1 bar

entry.title: Rock Candy on a Stick - Blue Raspberry
entry.summary:
Vendor: Espeez
Type: Candy
Price: 2.09

Crystalized Candy For Any Occasion

     For the most delicious flavours and vibrant colours for Rock Candy on a Stick, look no further than Espeez. Simply made with sugar and water, the sticks' crystals slowly blossom to become tasty treats and beautiful displays. 

     Deep blue like a vast ocean and full of juicy berry flavour, Blue Raspberry Rock Candy makes the perfect treat that doubles as a gorgeous display. Use in your next wedding, birthday party, shower, or corporate event for a sight that'll impress all your guests - and a flavour that's sure to shock their tastebuds!


Make any event absolutely stunning with our wide assortment of Rock Candy on a Stick colours and flavours!

 

22g | 1 stick
